title: Dark Star Urgot
body:
Hey guys, I had a crazy idea for a D.S.U. skin. Lower half and gun are sort of the obelisk stones from dark star thresh arena mode. Ult is a black hole, other ideas scribbled while drawing. Left arm could be a tentacle? Not much thought on that apendage.

I hope my crappy drawings come through sharing my ideas and weird concepts for him.
Would be awesome for Urgot to get a proper VO with this skin like dark star thresh. ({{champion:6}}  likes to monologue)

I think you will find this useful: 
https://www.camscanner.com/share/V7dol/0/w105s112orf14
 Shared using #CamScanner

(The Trapezohedron is from darkest dungeon, I'm just using it as a reference. Spooky alien stuff and all that jazz!)

Also would be the 5th dark star, and top laner for the skin team I think? So makes a full skin team!!! 

As in the paper notes, anyone can use these ideas and expand or criticize or, I dunno, make it real and put em in a video game we all play.

replies.body: I got no idea if the link worked, oh well, maybe I'll check back on this, tomorrow? And hour from now? After Dark Star Squad devours the cosmos?
